select.if: select r.*, u.username from review_tb as r inner join user_tb as u on r.user_id = u.id inner join product_tb as p on r.prod_id = p.id order by r.heart desc
select r.*, u.username from review_tb as r inner join user_tb as u on r.user_id = u.id inner join product_tb as p on r.prod_id = p.id order by r.id desc

mapper.select: select r.*, u.username from review_tb as r inner join user_tb as u on r.user_id = u.id where review_category_id=#{reviewCategoryId}

select u.username, u.id as user_id, r.*, p.img_route, p.eng_name, p.kor_name, u.image, p.* from review_tb as r inner join product_tb as p on r.prod_id = p.id inner join user_tb as u on r.user_id=u.id where r.id=#{id}
select u.id as user_id, r.*, u.* from review_tb as r inner join user_tb as u on u.id = r.user_id where user_id=#{userId}

select r.*, p.*, s.name as size_name, b.name as brand_name, p.id as prod_id, b.id as brand_id from review_tb as r inner join user_tb as u on r.user_id=u.id inner join product_tb as p on r.prod_id=p.id inner join size_tb as s on p.size_id=s.id inner join brand_tb as b on b.id=p.brand_id where u.username=#{userName}
select r.* from review_tb as r inner join user_tb as u on r.user_id=u.id where u.username=#{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into review_tb(title, content, user_id, prod_id, review_category_id, upload_file_name, origin_file_name) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{prodId}, #{reviewCategoryId}, #{uploadFileName}, #{originFileName})
mapper.select: select r.id, r.user_id, r.title, r.content, r.created_at, r.origin_file_name, r.upload_file_name, p.model_number, p.color, p.eng_name, p.kor_name, p.id as prod_id, s.name as size_name, b.name as brand_name, b.id as brand_id from review_tb as r inner join product_tb as p on r.prod_id=p.id inner join size_tb as s on s.id=p.size_id inner join brand_tb as b on b.id = p.brand_id inner join user_tb as u on r.user_id = u.id where u.username=#{userName} order by r.id desc
